As for restrictions or rules, I would need to review the lease agreement to provide you with more information. However, there may be rules regarding things like pets, noise levels, and use of the property.

Regarding the current occupancy status, I will need to check with my property management team to confirm this for you. Once I have this information, we can proceed with the negotiation process and discuss the rental price in more detail.
